reviewText:
These are two of my favorite films produced by Full Moon making this a must-have disc for me.

If you enjoyed these movies, there are "Lunar Edition" releases of both that contain a lot of cool extras.
Thanks Littlebit 179 for this awesome movie-been wanting this one for a long time-YOUR  AWESOME

If you love low-budget/no budget cheese filled horror, then these movies will do you justice! If you are looking for Hollywood style big named actors and such, then you need to search under "Micheal Bay" or "Christopher Nolan" to see if they can meet what you are looking for. If you want fun and gore, you need to see these two movies. 'Dead and Rotting' is best (actually one of my all time favorite movies), but 'Stitches' is still worth the watch. Great stories and great work with what the creators had to film with.
